14/* RFC2671 */
15
16#ifndef RDATA_GENERIC_OPT_41_C
17#define RDATA_GENERIC_OPT_41_C
18
19#define RRTYPE_OPT_ATTRIBUTES (DNS_RDATATYPEATTR_SINGLETON | \
20 DNS_RDATATYPEATTR_META | \
21 DNS_RDATATYPEATTR_NOTQUESTION)
22
23static inline isc_result_t
24fromtext_opt(ARGS_FROMTEXT) {
25 /*
26 * OPT records do not have a text format.
27 */
28
29 REQUIRE(type == dns_rdatatype_opt);
30
31 UNUSED(type);
32 UNUSED(rdclass);
33 UNUSED(lexer);
34 UNUSED(origin);
35 UNUSED(options);
36 UNUSED(target);
37 UNUSED(callbacks);
38
39 return (ISC_R_NOTIMPLEMENTED);
40}
41
42static inline isc_result_t
43totext_opt(ARGS_TOTEXT) {
44 isc_region_t r;
45 isc_region_t or;
46 uint16_t option;
47 uint16_t length;
48 char buf[sizeof("64000 64000")];
49
50 /*
51 * OPT records do not have a text format.
52 */
53
54 REQUIRE(rdata->type == dns_rdatatype_opt);
55
56 dns_rdata_toregion(rdata, &r);
57 while (r.length > 0) {
58 option = uint16_fromregion(&r);
59 isc_region_consume(&r, 2);
60 length = uint16_fromregion(&r);
61 isc_region_consume(&r, 2);
62 snprintf(buf, sizeof(buf), "%u %u", option, length);
63 RETERR(str_totext(buf, target));
64 INSIST(r.length >= length);
65 if (length > 0) {
66 if ((tctx->flags & DNS_STYLEFLAG_MULTILINE) != 0)
67 RETERR(str_totext(" (", target));
68 RETERR(str_totext(tctx->linebreak, target));
69 or = r;
70 or.length = length;
71 if (tctx->width == 0) /* No splitting */
72 RETERR(isc_base64_totext(&or, 60, "", target));
73 else
74 RETERR(isc_base64_totext(&or, tctx->width - 2,
75 tctx->linebreak,
76 target));
77 isc_region_consume(&r, length);
78 if ((tctx->flags & DNS_STYLEFLAG_MULTILINE) != 0)
79 RETERR(str_totext(" )", target));
80 }
81 if (r.length > 0)
82 RETERR(str_totext(" ", target));
83 }
84
85 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
86}
87
88static inline isc_result_t
89fromwire_opt(ARGS_FROMWIRE) {
90 isc_region_t sregion;
91 isc_region_t tregion;
92 uint16_t opt;
93 uint16_t length;
94 unsigned int total;
95
96 REQUIRE(type == dns_rdatatype_opt);
97
98 UNUSED(type);
99 UNUSED(rdclass);
100 UNUSED(dctx);
101 UNUSED(options);
102
103 isc_buffer_activeregion(source, &sregion);
104 if (sregion.length == 0)
105 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
106 total = 0;
107 while (sregion.length != 0) {
108 if (sregion.length < 4)
109 return (ISC_R_UNEXPECTEDEND);
110 opt = uint16_fromregion(&sregion);
111 isc_region_consume(&sregion, 2);
112 length = uint16_fromregion(&sregion);
113 isc_region_consume(&sregion, 2);
114 total += 4;
115 if (sregion.length < length)
116 return (ISC_R_UNEXPECTEDEND);
117 switch (opt) {
118 case DNS_OPT_CLIENT_SUBNET: {
119 uint16_t family;
120 uint8_t addrlen;
121 uint8_t scope;
122 uint8_t addrbytes;
123
124 if (length < 4)
125 return (DNS_R_OPTERR);
126 family = uint16_fromregion(&sregion);
127 isc_region_consume(&sregion, 2);
128 addrlen = uint8_fromregion(&sregion);
129 isc_region_consume(&sregion, 1);
130 scope = uint8_fromregion(&sregion);
131 isc_region_consume(&sregion, 1);
132
133 switch (family) {
134 case 0:
135 /*
136 * XXXMUKS: In queries and replies, if
137 * FAMILY is set to 0, SOURCE
138 * PREFIX-LENGTH and SCOPE PREFIX-LENGTH
139 * must be 0 and ADDRESS should not be
140 * present as the address and prefix
141 * lengths don't make sense because the
142 * family is unknown.
143 */
144 if (addrlen != 0U || scope != 0U)
145 return (DNS_R_OPTERR);
146 break;
147 case 1:
148 if (addrlen > 32U || scope > 32U)
149 return (DNS_R_OPTERR);
150 break;
151 case 2:
152 if (addrlen > 128U || scope > 128U)
153 return (DNS_R_OPTERR);
154 break;
155 default:
156 return (DNS_R_OPTERR);
157 }
158 addrbytes = (addrlen + 7) / 8;
159 if (addrbytes + 4 != length)
160 return (DNS_R_OPTERR);
161
162 if (addrbytes != 0U && (addrlen % 8) != 0) {
163 uint8_t bits = ~0U << (8 - (addrlen % 8));
164 bits &= sregion.base[addrbytes - 1];
165 if (bits != sregion.base[addrbytes - 1])
166 return (DNS_R_OPTERR);
167 }
168 isc_region_consume(&sregion, addrbytes);
169 break;
170 }
171 case DNS_OPT_EXPIRE:
172 /*
173 * Request has zero length. Response is 32 bits.
174 */
175 if (length != 0 && length != 4)
176 return (DNS_R_OPTERR);
177 isc_region_consume(&sregion, length);
178 break;
179 case DNS_OPT_COOKIE:
180 if (length != 8 && (length < 16 || length > 40))
181 return (DNS_R_OPTERR);
182 isc_region_consume(&sregion, length);
183 break;
184 case DNS_OPT_KEY_TAG:
185 if (length == 0 || (length % 2) != 0)
186 return (DNS_R_OPTERR);
187 isc_region_consume(&sregion, length);
188 break;
189 default:
190 isc_region_consume(&sregion, length);
191 break;
192 }
193 total += length;
194 }
195
196 isc_buffer_activeregion(source, &sregion);
197 isc_buffer_availableregion(target, &tregion);
198 if (tregion.length < total)
199 return (ISC_R_NOSPACE);
200 memmove(tregion.base, sregion.base, total);
201 isc_buffer_forward(source, total);
202 isc_buffer_add(target, total);
203
204 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
205}
206
207static inline isc_result_t
208towire_opt(ARGS_TOWIRE) {
209
210 REQUIRE(rdata->type == dns_rdatatype_opt);
211
212 UNUSED(cctx);
213
214 return (mem_tobuffer(target, rdata->data, rdata->length));
215}
216
217static inline int
218compare_opt(ARGS_COMPARE) {
219 isc_region_t r1;
220 isc_region_t r2;
221
222 REQUIRE(rdata1->type == rdata2->type);
223 REQUIRE(rdata1->rdclass == rdata2->rdclass);
224 REQUIRE(rdata1->type == dns_rdatatype_opt);
225
226 dns_rdata_toregion(rdata1, &r1);
227 dns_rdata_toregion(rdata2, &r2);
228 return (isc_region_compare(&r1, &r2));
229}
230
231static inline isc_result_t
232fromstruct_opt(ARGS_FROMSTRUCT) {
233 dns_rdata_opt_t *opt = source;
234 isc_region_t region;
235 uint16_t length;
236
237 REQUIRE(type == dns_rdatatype_opt);
238 REQUIRE(source != NULL);
239 REQUIRE(opt->common.rdtype == type);
240 REQUIRE(opt->common.rdclass == rdclass);
241 REQUIRE(opt->options != NULL || opt->length == 0);
242
243 UNUSED(type);
244 UNUSED(rdclass);
245
246 region.base = opt->options;
247 region.length = opt->length;
248 while (region.length >= 4) {
249 isc_region_consume(&region, 2); /* opt */
250 length = uint16_fromregion(&region);
251 isc_region_consume(&region, 2);
252 if (region.length < length)
253 return (ISC_R_UNEXPECTEDEND);
254 isc_region_consume(&region, length);
255 }
256 if (region.length != 0)
257 return (ISC_R_UNEXPECTEDEND);
258
259 return (mem_tobuffer(target, opt->options, opt->length));
260}
261
262static inline isc_result_t
263tostruct_opt(ARGS_TOSTRUCT) {
264 dns_rdata_opt_t *opt = target;
265 isc_region_t r;
266
267 REQUIRE(rdata->type == dns_rdatatype_opt);
268 REQUIRE(target != NULL);
269
270 opt->common.rdclass = rdata->rdclass;
271 opt->common.rdtype = rdata->type;
272 ISC_LINK_INIT(&opt->common, link);
273
274 dns_rdata_toregion(rdata, &r);
275 opt->length = r.length;
276 opt->options = mem_maybedup(mctx, r.base, r.length);
277 if (opt->options == NULL)
278 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
279
280 opt->offset = 0;
281 opt->mctx = mctx;
282 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
283}
284
285static inline void
286freestruct_opt(ARGS_FREESTRUCT) {
287 dns_rdata_opt_t *opt = source;
288
289 REQUIRE(source != NULL);
290 REQUIRE(opt->common.rdtype == dns_rdatatype_opt);
291
292 if (opt->mctx == NULL)
293 return;
294
295 if (opt->options != NULL)
296 isc_mem_free(opt->mctx, opt->options);
297 opt->mctx = NULL;
298}
299
300static inline isc_result_t
301additionaldata_opt(ARGS_ADDLDATA) {
302 REQUIRE(rdata->type == dns_rdatatype_opt);
303
304 UNUSED(rdata);
305 UNUSED(add);
306 UNUSED(arg);
307
308 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
309}
310
311static inline isc_result_t
312digest_opt(ARGS_DIGEST) {
313
314 /*
315 * OPT records are not digested.
316 */
317
318 REQUIRE(rdata->type == dns_rdatatype_opt);
319
320 UNUSED(rdata);
321 UNUSED(digest);
322 UNUSED(arg);
323
324 return (ISC_R_NOTIMPLEMENTED);
325}
326
327static inline bool
328checkowner_opt(ARGS_CHECKOWNER) {
329
330 REQUIRE(type == dns_rdatatype_opt);
331
332 UNUSED(type);
333 UNUSED(rdclass);
334 UNUSED(wildcard);
335
336 return (dns_name_equal(name, dns_rootname));
337}
338
339static inline bool
340checknames_opt(ARGS_CHECKNAMES) {
341
342 REQUIRE(rdata->type == dns_rdatatype_opt);
343
344 UNUSED(rdata);
345 UNUSED(owner);
346 UNUSED(bad);
347
348 return (true);
349}
350
351static inline int
352casecompare_opt(ARGS_COMPARE) {
353 return (compare_opt(rdata1, rdata2));
354}
355
356isc_result_t
357dns_rdata_opt_first(dns_rdata_opt_t *opt) {
358
359 REQUIRE(opt != NULL);
360 REQUIRE(opt->common.rdtype == dns_rdatatype_opt);
361 REQUIRE(opt->options != NULL || opt->length == 0);
362
363 if (opt->length == 0)
364 return (ISC_R_NOMORE);
365
366 opt->offset = 0;
367 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
368}
369
370isc_result_t
371dns_rdata_opt_next(dns_rdata_opt_t *opt) {
372 isc_region_t r;
373 uint16_t length;
374
375 REQUIRE(opt != NULL);
376 REQUIRE(opt->common.rdtype == dns_rdatatype_opt);
377 REQUIRE(opt->options != NULL && opt->length != 0);
378 REQUIRE(opt->offset < opt->length);
379
380 INSIST(opt->offset + 4 <= opt->length);
381 r.base = opt->options + opt->offset + 2;
382 r.length = opt->length - opt->offset - 2;
383 length = uint16_fromregion(&r);
384 INSIST(opt->offset + 4 + length <= opt->length);
385 opt->offset = opt->offset + 4 + length;
386 if (opt->offset == opt->length)
387 return (ISC_R_NOMORE);
388 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
389}
390
391isc_result_t
392dns_rdata_opt_current(dns_rdata_opt_t *opt, dns_rdata_opt_opcode_t *opcode) {
393 isc_region_t r;
394
395 REQUIRE(opt != NULL);
396 REQUIRE(opcode != NULL);
397 REQUIRE(opt->common.rdtype == dns_rdatatype_opt);
398 REQUIRE(opt->options != NULL);
399 REQUIRE(opt->offset < opt->length);
400
401 INSIST(opt->offset + 4 <= opt->length);
402 r.base = opt->options + opt->offset;
403 r.length = opt->length - opt->offset;
404
405 opcode->opcode = uint16_fromregion(&r);
406 isc_region_consume(&r, 2);
407 opcode->length = uint16_fromregion(&r);
408 isc_region_consume(&r, 2);
409 opcode->data = r.base;
410 INSIST(opt->offset + 4 + opcode->length <= opt->length);
411
412 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
413}
414
415#endif /* RDATA_GENERIC_OPT_41_C */
